message: http://i.imgur.com/1gitb.jpg new update looks good so far
It's great! They're listening to users feedback!
@felipecerda they fixed many bugs, updated to how groups are listed and if you make a group as read you go back to the group page this all good stuff
maybe even a tweet your post checkbox...this will also help us spread the word about convore if we tweeted some of our public posts.
I still want to see media uploading tools within the app.

@craigshipp media uploading tools? Last time I checked this isn't a video or image host, and I rather them focus on the core no stupid things like that and second there is a share group on the site that is good enough
@italiano40 yep, this would make it much easier to include a photo in a posting from my iPhone.

@italiano40 yes, but couldn't they use some other image hosting service like yfrog? As it stands now one needs to upload a photo or screen shot using another app and then go back to convore and copy and paste the image URL. Or am I missing something?

@kevindolan  @craigshipp yea i don't feel posting a picture is that important maybe they had no bug fixes or anything include but images are what this type of forums are about it is nice to have the image show up in the message, but it isn't that great part of the service

I would still like to see group URL included in the group search tool. If I know the URL of the convore group I'm looking for I would like to be able to type that in and go direct to the group. If I don't know the URL I can resort to the search option. Or am I missing something?
